At Finda Cloud, we believe that strong technology is built on even stronger relationships. As we wrap up a dynamic 2025, our VP - Asia, Victor Leung and Regional Business Development Director, Kelvin Cheung, has been on the ground visiting our key vendor partners across Singapore, Malaysia, and Taiwan.

The feedback from our partners has been clear: the region is ready for growth. We are bringing back exciting new strategies to support our channel network.
The foundation is set. Stay tuned for a massive 2026!

posts.description:
Finda Cloud Technology is thrilled to announce our new partnership with We+ Asia, a leader in IT and digital solutions. We are excited to welcome them to them ever-expanding ecosystem of resellers.

We+ brings a wealth of expertise in digital transformation, application development, and IT infrastructure. Their commitment to excellence and a proactive, strategic approach to client services perfectly aligns with our own values. This partnership will undoubtedly bring significant value to our customers.

By combining We+'s consulting prowess with our robust portfolio of solutions, including Freshworks and Device42, A Freshworks Company, we are poised to create powerful, comprehensive offerings that will drive innovation and efficiency for businesses. We are confident that this collaboration will unlock new opportunities and generate immense value for our mutual clients.

Join us in extending a warm welcome to the We+ team! We are excited to embark on this journey together and look forward to a future of shared success.

A heartfelt thank you to Freshworks for inviting Finda Cloud Technology to this wonderful gathering at the Quaich Bar, InterContinental Singapore. It was a night filled with camaraderie, insightful conversations, and the promise of collaboration.

As the APAC distributer of Freshworks, we were thrilled to connect with so many incredible C-Suite leaders who shared their thoughts on the power of open communication and the transformative impact of AI in our work lives, contributing to an evening of shared insights and friendships.

posts.description:
We're excited to announce Finda Cloud Technology is the official APAC distributor for Prosfinity's AIShieldNet!

Traditional EDR solutions rely on signatures, leaving a gap for zero-day attacks. AIShieldNet closes this gap.

It's the first AI Zero Day Response (ZDR) solution that uses advanced AI (LLMs) to set a new standard in endpoint security.

Why AIShieldNet?
- Real-Time Zero-Day Detection: Analyzes 100% of processes without signatures to stop fileless malware and novel attacks.
- Stops Alert Fatigue: The AI filters noise and provides clear, natural-language explanations, letting your team focus on real threats.
- Catches What EDR Misses: Understands behavior and intent, not just patterns.

Finda Cloud is proud to bring this next-gen AI-driven cybersecurity to the APAC region.

Contact us to learn how to secure your organization against modern threats!
https://prosfinity.com/
